text: e) Adolescent idiopathic scoliosis ?,"Adolescent idiopathic scoliosis is an abnormal curvature of the spine that appears in late childhood or adolescence. Instead of growing straight, the spine develops a side-to-side curvature, usually in an elongated ""s"" or ""C"" shape, and the bones of the spine become slightly twisted or rotated.
